Seattle, WA - http://wap-jobs.amazon.com/jobs.html (email is on the page linked)

Nearly every team in the Website Application Platform org is currently hiring. We build the backend components that power amazon.com and many of the subsidiaries/affiliates. We solve difficult problems involving scalable, performant distributed systems and have a direct effect on customer experience. If that sounds like you're cup of tea, it might be worth checking out!

Also, arcade cabinets, nerf gun fights, and free cereal. It's a good place to be. :)
